description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Chicken & Avocado Burrito + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Chicken & Avocado Burrito + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 60g RSPCA approved chicken breast fillets skinless

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 wholegrain wrap on a clean work surface.

Place 1/5 avocado, thinly sliced, on centre of tortilla, then top with 1/5 (50g) red capsicum, deseeded, thinly sliced, cooked Australian RSPCA Approved Chicken Breast Fillets Skinless (60g Raw weight), thinly sliced, and 2 tbs (15g) grated Hillview Cheese.
Roll firmly to enclose filling. Wrap burrito in plastic wrap.

Pack next to frozen drink or cool brick in lunch box to keep cool. Snack 1: Cut carrots into sticks and serve it with cucumber and tzatziki. Snack 2: Cut cheese into slices and serve it with the crispbread.
